verses.roman:
tomāra deha kahena prabhu 'mora nija-dhana'
tomā-sama bhāgyavān nāhi kona jana

synonyms: tomāra deha—your body; kahena prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu says; mora—My; nija-dhana—personal property; tomā-sama—like you; bhāgyavān—fortunate person; nāhi—there is not; kona jana—anyone.
translation: "Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has accepted your body as His own property. Therefore no one can equal you in good fortune.
